contentrichtext.text: {{notability|Biographies|date=August 2008}} {{nihongo|'''Yuka Inokuchi'''|猪口 有佳|Inokuchi Yuka|born June 5, 1978}} is a Japanese [[Voice acting in Japan|voice actress]] who is affiliated with [[Ken Production]]. She is originally from [[Kurume, Fukuoka|Kurume]], [[Fukuoka Prefecture]]. ==Voice Roles== ===Anime TV series=== * ''[[Ai Yori Aoshi]]'' (Uzume) * ''[[Buso Renkin]]'' (Chisato Nekamiya) * ''[[Canvas 2 ~Niji Iro no Sketch~]]'' (Saya Saginomiya) * ''[[Girls Bravo]]'' (Hinata) * ''[[Chibi Vampire]]'' (Anju Maaka) * ''[[Kaze no Stigma]]'' (Yukari Shinomiya) * ''[[Koi to Senkyo to Chocolate]]'' (Ai Sarue) * ''[[Maburaho]]'' (Rin Kamishiro) * ''[[Mahoraba|Mahoraba Heartful Days]]'' (Sakura) * ''[[Negima!]]'' ([[Characters of Negima (16-31)#Zazie Rainyday|Zazie Rainyday]]) * ''[[Tsuki wa Higashi ni, Hi wa Nishi ni -Operation Sanctuary-]]'' (Yui Nonohara) * ''[[Zero no Tsukaima]] (Tabitha/Charlotte Helene Orléans) * ''[[Yosuga no Sora]]'' ('''Nao Yorihime''') * ''[[Yozakura Quartet]] (Kana Tatebayashi) ===Video games=== * ''[[Galaxy Angel]]: Eternal Lovers'' (Lushati) * ''[[Rumble Roses XX]]'' ([[List of Rumble Roses characters#Aigle|Aigle]] / [[List of Rumble Roses characters#Great Khan aka Killer Khan|Great Kahn]]) ==References== <references/> * Taniguchi, Hiroshi et al. "The Official Art of Canvas2 ~Nijiiro no Sketch~". (November 2006) ''Newtype USA''. pp. 101–107. ==External links== *{{Language icon|ja|Japanese}} [http://www.kenproduction.co.jp/list/inokuchi_3.html Yuka Inokuchi] at Ken Production *{{Language icon|en|English}} {{ann|people|id=25953}} *{{Language icon|en|English}} [http://www.seiyuu.info/extendedlisting.php?seiyuu=Yuka+Inokuchi Yuka Inokuchi] at Ryu's Seiyuu Infos {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Inokuchi, Yuka | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Japanese voice actor | DATE OF BIRTH = June 5, 1978 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Inokuchi, Yuka}} [[Category:1978 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Japanese voice actresses]] [[Category:People from Kurume, Fukuoka]]
